labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: There is no messages and you have to click "Load more messages"
data.expected_result: The message(s) should load without any issues without having to click "Load messages"
data.short_description: Clicking on a server icon you haven't "watched" from the mutual servers list will not load the messages in the default channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Open someones profile - Click on mutual servers - Click on a random server
